thread.title: Dollar, shares buffeted by trade war worries

title: Dollar, shares buffeted by trade war worries
text:
Dollar, shares buffeted by trade war worries 10:27am EDT - 01:38 
Global trade war worries and a steady message on U.S. rates hikes from the Fed push the dollar to its lowest in over a month and send Europe's share markets into the red. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Global trade war worries and a steady message on U.S. rates hikes from the Fed push the dollar to its lowest in over a month and send Europe's share markets into the red. David Pollard reports.
